result.title: Demo of touchless haptics using ultrasound on both glabrous and non-glabrous skin
result.description: A standalone demonstrator in which the user can put the arm and feel ultrasonic haptic feedback both on the hand and the forearm For the forearm the stimulation targets the hairs so different parameters can be adjusted to match the type of hair An internal document that may be published on a demo track of a conference will describe the parameters to operate this setup

result.title: Demo of touchless haptics combining electrostatic and ultrasound
result.description: A system to create piloerection at target positions with patterns that vary over time Premade patterns can be generated directly with the demonstrator whereas userdefined patterns require the use of an external computer The system can be coupled with an ultrasonic stimulator to create multimodal experiences The setup will be reported in article format for peer review publication containing operational and setup knowledge
